name: long-rest-hd-healing-round-up
title: Long Rest Hit Die Healing for D&D5e With Rounding Up
description: Adds the "Slow Natural Healing" rules to the dnd5e system. Rather than healing to full hit points, actors now have the option to spend hit dice on a long rest. This alternate version rounds up the hit die recovered.
author: Cole Schultz (cole#9640), Alex Moriarty
